pullrequest.title: Re-wrote the instructions to specify gazebo plugins within a ROS URDF file.

content.raw:
Good point. How about rephrasing to make it clear that we're talking about loading plugins from URDF? Because you can have ROS (GUI / world, etc) plugins, just not through the URDF.

Something like:

`Gazebo has [several plugin types](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=plugins_hello_world&cat=write_plugin), and all of them can be connected to ROS, but only a few types can be referenced through a URDF file:`

And also add `VisualPlugin` to the list, because it can be within a `<visual>` tag.
